description: Photorealistic Zodiac Sign Prompt Matrix for Stable Diffusion
notes: This matrix provides sign-specific prompts for both professional and erotic research profiles. Each prompt is optimized for Stable Diffusion XL with a photorealistic style.

professional.photorealism_keywords: raw photo, 8k, highres, photorealistic, professional headshot
professional.appearance: strong posture, direct gaze, professional attire with bold red accent
professional.setting: modern office environment, sleek architecture, bright lighting
professional.pose: confident stance, arms crossed, direct camera eye contact
professional.full_prompt: Professional headshot of confident Aries personality, strong posture with direct gaze, wearing professional attire with subtle red accent, in modern office environment with sleek architecture, raw photo, 8k, highres, photorealistic, ultra-detailed, professional lighting
